title: 111_hr6190
content: The "Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2010, Part III" extends fuel and ticket taxes funding the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until December 31, 2010. The amendments made by this Act will take effect on October 1, 2010. The Authority section of the Internal Revenue Code is amended to change the effective date to January 1, 2011, and includes the Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2010, Part III. The Airport Improvement Program is extended with amendments to authorize appropriations until December 31, 2010. The Airport Improvement Program is extended with amendments to authorize appropriations until December 31, 2010. Section 40117(l)(7) of title 49, United States Code, is amended to change the effective date to January 1, 2011. Section 41743(e)(2) is also amended to extend the expiration date to 2011. Section 44302(f)(1) is amended as well. Section 44302(f)(1), 44303(b), 47107(s)(3), 47115(j), 47141(f), and 49108 of title 49, United States Code, are all amended to change dates from 2010 to 2011. Section 161 of the Vision 100--Century of Aviation Reauthorization Act is amended to include fiscal year 2011, Section 186(d) is amended for fiscal year 2011, and Section 409(d) is amended to extend to September 30, 2011. These amendments will take effect on October 1, 2010. Additionally, technical corrections are made to the Airline Safety and Federal Aviation Administration Extension Act of 2010. In section 202(a) and 202(b) of title 49, United States Code, amendments are made. Section 203(c)(1) and 203(c)(2) are also amended in the same title. The curr_chunk is about the roles of the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the Vice President of the United States as President of the Senate.
